rules.name: High-Frequency Communication Between Two Parties
rules.description: Detects unusually frequent calls or messages between two numbers within a short time window.
rules.sql_template: SELECT MOBILENUMBER, B_MOBILENUMBER, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CALLS FROM cdr WHERE TRANSACTIONSTARTTIME >= TIMESTAMPADD(HOUR, -$TIME_WINDOW_HOURS, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) GROUP BY MOBILENUMBER, B_MOBILENUMBER HAVING TOTAL_CALLS > $FREQUENCY_THRESHOLD

rules.name: Unusual Call Duration
rules.description: Detects abnormally long or short calls.
rules.sql_template: SELECT MOBILENUMBER, B_MOBILENUMBER, DURATION FROM cdr WHERE DURATION < $MIN_DURATION_SEC OR DURATION > $MAX_DURATION_SEC

rules.name: Communication With Known Blacklisted Numbers
rules.description: Flags calls or messages to/from numbers on a watchlist.
rules.sql_template: SELECT c.MOBILENUMBER, c.B_MOBILENUMBER, w.WATCHLIST_ID AS MATCHED_WATCHLIST_ID FROM cdr c JOIN $WATCHLIST_TABLE w ON c.MOBILENUMBER = w.NUMBER OR c.B_MOBILENUMBER = w.NUMBER

rules.name: Frequent Cell Tower Location Changes
rules.description: Detects rapid movement across large distances.
rules.sql_template: SELECT MOBILENUMBER, COUNT(DISTINCT BTS) AS TOTAL_BTS_CHANGES FROM cdr WHERE TRANSACTIONSTARTTIME >= TIMESTAMPADD(HOUR, -$TIME_WINDOW_HOURS, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) GROUP BY MOBILENUMBER HAVING TOTAL_BTS_CHANGES > $LOCATION_CHANGE_THRESHOLD

rules.name: SIM Swap Detection
rules.description: Detects multiple IMEIs for same mobile number in a short time window, indicating a potential SIM swap.
rules.sql_template: SELECT MOBILENUMBER, COUNT(DISTINCT IMEI) AS CHANGE_COUNT FROM cdr WHERE TRANSACTIONSTARTTIME >= TIMESTAMPADD(HOUR, -$TIME_WINDOW_HOURS, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) GROUP BY MOBILENUMBER HAVING CHANGE_COUNT > $IMEI_CHANGE_THRESHOLD

rules.name: High Volume of International Calls
rules.description: Flags unusual spikes in calls to foreign destinations, often used for organized crime.
rules.sql_template: SELECT MOBILENUMBER, DSTCOUNTRY, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_FOREIGN_CALLS FROM cdr WHERE DSTCOUNTRY <> 'LOCAL' AND TRANSACTIONSTARTTIME >= TIMESTAMPADD(HOUR, -$TIME_WINDOW_HOURS, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) GROUP BY MOBILENUMBER, DSTCOUNTRY HAVING TOTAL_FOREIGN_CALLS > $FOREIGN_CALL_THRESHOLD

rules.name: Suspicious VoIP Traffic
rules.description: Detects encrypted or obfuscated VoIP calls outside of normal business hours, which may indicate covert communication.
rules.sql_template: SELECT MOBILENUMBER, APPLICATION FROM ipdr WHERE APPLICATION = 'VoIP' AND (HOUR(TRANSACTIONSTARTTIME) < $ALLOWED_HOURS_START OR HOUR(TRANSACTIONSTARTTIME) > $ALLOWED_HOURS_END)

rules.name: Repeated Contact With Foreign IP Addresses
rules.description: Flags repeated communications with the same foreign server IP, which could signal a command-and-control connection.
rules.sql_template: SELECT MOBILENUMBER, SERVERIP, DSTCOUNTRY FROM ipdr WHERE DSTCOUNTRY <> 'LOCAL' AND TRANSACTIONSTARTTIME >= DATEADD(DAY, -$TIME_WINDOW_DAYS, CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY MOBILENUMBER, SERVERIP, DSTCOUNTRY HAVING COUNT(*) > $REPEAT_CONTACT_THRESHOLD

rules.name: Access to Restricted Online Services
rules.description: Detects access to restricted or illegal domains/apps from the IPDR data.
rules.sql_template: SELECT i.MOBILENUMBER, i.DOMAIN, i.APPCATEGORY FROM ipdr i JOIN $RESTRICTED_TABLE r ON i.DOMAIN = r.DOMAIN OR i.APPCATEGORY = r.APPCATEGORY

rules.name: Multiple Devices Using Same IP
rules.description: Detects when multiple unique IMEIs use the same IP address in a short time, indicating a potential hotspot or shared connection for coordinated activity.
rules.sql_template: SELECT SERVERIP, COUNT(DISTINCT IMEI) AS DEVICE_COUNT FROM ipdr WHERE TRANSACTIONSTARTTIME >= TIMESTAMPADD(HOUR, -$TIME_WINDOW_HOURS, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) GROUP BY SERVERIP HAVING DEVICE_COUNT > $DEVICE_COUNT_THRESHOLD
